title: Lag as Minions Spawn
body: As minions spawn my ping starts to jump between 100 and 2000 causing rubber banding and general unresponsive. Just switched internet providers and other games and websites seem to have no issues. Any suggestions?

replies.body: It sounds like you're having some input delay that can be caused by various network issues like packet loss.  You may need to tune up your network and settings now that you have a new ISP, and I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to do that.  Make sure to follow each step there to make sure everything is running smoothly.  Let me know if you have any questions!
